info.name: Fresh FxP
info.description: FxP with new and fresh style. NEW! CREATE YOUR VERSION OF THIS STYLE! -------------------------------- What's new? - In thread arrows styled. - Under embed video squares styled. - Chat styled! -------------------------------- Note: There are bugs with some resolutions. The optimal resolution is 1366X768px. I recommend to install Alef font on your computer for better UI. -------------------------------- New! Check out the mobile & green versions! Created by EvyatarDa(c) (Link to developer).
